title: The Hour before my brother dies
creator_credit: Noel Price, James Clayden, Daniel Keene and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Adapted from the stage play by Daniel Keene. Sally visits her brother Martin, the hour before he is due to be hanged for murder. What is the hold these two have on each other physically and emotionally? Cast includes Peter Hehir (Martin), Rhonda Wilson (Sally), Reg Evans (father) and Margot Duell (mother).
